content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))
- Steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)) is connected to small-electric-pole (position (119.5, -30.5))
- Boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) is connected to pipes at positions (109.5, -31.5) and (113.5, -31.5)
- Offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) is connected to pipes at position (107.5, -34.5)

### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a single furnace with no input or output connections

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5) with direction UP

### PipeGroup for water at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5)

### PipeGroup for steam at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and others, connecting the steam engine to the boiler

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a boiler
- Make sure to check the inventory for the item to be inserted before attempting to insert it
- Ensure the boiler has enough space to hold the item

### Errors when using a steam engine
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a power pole
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to produce steam

### Errors when using a furnace
- Make sure the furnace has input and output connections
- Ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate

# NAMESPACE
### Utility functions
- `insert_item`: inserts an item into a container
- `get_inventory`: gets the current inventory
- `get_entities`: gets the entities on the map

### Important variables
- `transport-belt`: int, the number of transport belts in the inventory
- `small-electric-pole`: int, the number of small electric poles in the inventory
- `wood`: int, the number of wood in the inventory
- `iron-ore`: int, the number of iron ore in the inventory
- `copper-ore`: int, the number of copper ore in the inventory
- `iron-plate`: int, the number of iron plates in the inventory
- `copper-plate`: int, the number of copper plates in the inventory
- `copper-cable`: int, the number of copper cables in the inventory
- `iron-gear-wheel`: int, the number of iron gear wheels in the inventory
